pages.page: S.13. There are faculty rooms and officers.
The Maintenance or Utility worker checks and repairs the electrical problems of the campus.
The Utility personnel maintains the cleanliness and orderliness of the campus.
OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES
A counseling room is provided for students including those with special needs. It is located near the Office of Student Affairs and Services.
The Guidance and Counselling Room is managed by qualified personnel.
The Guidance and Counselling Room is equipped with materials necessary for the development of student well-being
